channel.title: ProIonic 718/742 - All-Skills-Work!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2w3nk89.png[/img]
ProIonic is an epic pvp and also skill based server with a stable economy, we are now open from beta and welcome you to join the astonishing server, ProIonic742! there are a few major updates like Dungeoneering and SummoningScrolls added to this server, also because we love to be flexible to your runescape private server needs.. . Just login and if you find something you dislike or something that you think should be added to improve this server then please talk to our staff team, they will contact me personally. ("you will not get banned for negative comments, since they help us improve and strive to be one of the best servers.")
[URL=http://proionic742.com]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://www.proionic742.com/proionic.jar]Client[/URL]
[URL=http://proionic742.com/webclient.html]webclient[/URL]
[SIZE=3]Features:[/SIZE] - Working NEX - DICING - Barrows - Jad - DominionTower - Corp Beast with dark core! - Online 24/7 with efficient updates - 100% Uptime - No lag - Money pouch - 100% trading - Queen Black Dragon - 63 wave Fight Caves - 100% Fight Pits Minigame - WORKING Summoning - WORKING Construction - 100%Working skills - Dominion Tower with rewards - Corporeal Beast - XP lamps/books - Perfect switching - Fully working curses,ancients,lunar and gfx. - quick and fun leveling - Economy - News announcements - boss kills, levels, and more! - Hours of fun - Dedicated staff team and developers that provide great player support - Active forums 24/7 - dicing - Summoning with working scrolls - Donator pets - epic pvp and pvm - Fully working MiniGames - Korasi and other weapons with proper special attack - dungeoneering floor with working boss! - Loads of shops - Working Skills
Disclaimer: As this is Open beta there still will be a lot of work that needs to be done and bugs that need to be fixed, so if you do find a bug please report it other wise don't abuse them, Thank you.
Media:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qm_fDlKlYzM http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NFlYfjTuJa8
[IMG]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/7977/k202.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img515/9553/javaw2012122920432865.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img842/7344/javaw2012122920415779.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img803/479/javaw2012122920373656.png[/img] [IMG]http://s21.postimg.org/53agjjmlz/slayer.png[/img] [IMG]http://s7.postimg.org/9kz15xjl7/construction.png[/img] [IMG]http://s11.postimg.org/7kmjhn89f/farming.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/ys1qgz1mh/2d6d0487688e45a009ef4eca616581c9.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/rkvg7d1bt/4f4429358607873016b8a0d6111d1fe4.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/to5vf114p/6aedeeb103edec018bf1244c76d467e5.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/5vwk3hz3t/3009b65a3e11fab0d7978b8127ad7d05.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/n099sfhmh/accfb7a51e148972776daee144b5f91b.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/h6z7rv5yx/b06ec1a83c76674e0c5f664523865b2e.png[/img] [IMG]http://s2.postimg.org/ejecv92bd/d68eedb7b9356f2fecfd92beda9696c7.png[/img] [IMG]http://s8.postimg.org/xwcqxul3p/tok.png[/img] [IMG]http://img.org/gbyai8lvl/dung.png[/img] [IMG]http://s13.postimg.org/dqt3f7f4n/droparty.png[/img]
[CODE]Updates: -Remove random event -Add New Items To shop -Remove Borrows Shop -Remove Partyhats from DonatorZone -Remove Vine Whip -Remove Flowers from shop -More Outfits -Add Mining Areas (Falador Mining Area) -Fix Dungeon Exit -Don't Allow Regular Members to Buy Donator Items (Smuggle items for players) -Fix QBD Lag -Make all Auras work -Fix Kiln Lag -ADD ivy support for wood cutting -Add needles thread -craftingshop and mycelium items to outfit shop for ganodermic support -Add Jadinko Lair -Ganodermic lair -Make the Teleports more organized -New Starters Items -Make ganodermic armor crafting -Make polypore staff crafting -Make gilded dragon pickaxe work -Add more teleports to quest tab -Add rules command to commands tab -Add elegent items -Add white armor drops to avatar of destruction -Add dragon (G) armor to new boss. -change tab called bosses to PvM ("sorry if missed something haha :p, more to come since this is updating week for proionic")[/CODE]
Will add more content later on:) ps. only give reasonable comments.. do not give short opinions of what you think about this server.

ProIonic is an epic pvp and also skill based server with a stable economy, we are now open from beta and welcome you to join the astonishing server, ProIonic742! there are a few major updates like Dungeoneering and SummoningScrolls added to this server, also because we love to be flexible to your runescape private server needs… . Just login and if you find something you dislike or something that you think should be added to improve this server then please talk to our staff team, they will contact me personally. (“you will not get banned for negative comments, since they help us improve and strive to be one of the best servers.”)
